com.hazebyte.crate.api.crate

Interface CrateRegistrar


  • public interface CrateRegistrar
    Contains methods used to manipulate and retrieve a crate.

    • Method Summary

           throws IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a crate with the given name, and type.

        name - The ID or name of the crate
        type - CrateType
        Returns:
        Crate
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the name or type is null

      • isCrate

        boolean isCrate(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Checks if the item represents a crate.
        Parameters:
        item - ItemStack
        Returns:
        true if the item is a crate, false otherwise.

      • add

        void add(Crate crate)
        Adds a crate to the plugin. This registers the crate and makes it available to use. todo List Requirements
        Parameters:
        crate - The crate that you want to add

      • remove

        void remove(Crate crate)
        Removes a crate from the plugin. This unregisters the crate from the plugin. Actions will no longer be handled by this crate if you do so.
        Parameters:
        crate - The crate that you will remove

      • open

        boolean open(Crate crate,
             org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
             Object... objects)

      • open

        boolean open(Crate crate,
             org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
             org.bukkit.Location location,
             Object... objects)
        Opens a crate and activates effects at the location.
        Parameters:
        crate - The crate that will be opened
        player - The player who will open the crate
        location - The location where the opening is based
        objects - Optional parameters
        Returns:
        true if reward size is not zero, false otherwise.

      • tryOpen

        boolean tryOpen(Crate crate,
                org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                org.bukkit.Location location,
                Object... objects)
        Tries to open a crate if there is no confirmation page otherwise this will first show the confirmation menu.
        Parameters:
        crate - The crate that will be opened
        player - The player who will open the crate
        location - The location where the opening is based
        objects - Optional parameters
        Returns:
        true if reward size is not zero, false otherwise.

      • preview

        boolean preview(Crate crate,
                org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Previews a crate in a built-in menu.
        Parameters:
        crate - The crate that will be previewed
        player - The player who wants to see the crate
        Returns:
        false

      • previewAll

        void previewAll(List<Crate> crates,
                org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Previews all crates in a built-in menu.
        Parameters:
        crates - The list of crates to be viewed
        player - The player who wants to see the crate
